problem.title: CheckPoint: Balance
problem.p: A horizontal uniform bar of mass $M kg and length L = 3.0 m is placed on two supports, labeled A and B, located as shown in the diagram. A block of mass $m kg is placed on the right end of the bar.
Part 1. Find the normal forces \(F_A \) and \(F_B\) exerted on the bar by the supports. Enter your answer in Newtons (N). Use g = 9.8 m/s2.
Part 2. If the $m kg block is to be replaced with another mass, what is the minimum mass m that would cause the bar to tip over? Enter your answer in kg.
